description:
Train or race, the X8 Classic boot is designed for fitness-oriented skiers and junior racers. The precise, enveloping fit offers good support, twist resistance, and control through each phase of your stride. Thermo adjustable liners can be heat-molded around your feet for a customized fit and comfort.

  • World-cup speed lace pull system
  • PVC lace covers with asymmetric zip, frees your instep for comfort
  • WINTHERM® breathable membrane reflects heat back towards its source for temperature regulation, comfort and warmth
  • Polyester thermo-adjustable inner liner
  • FW fit offers reduced instep volume and narrower fit from midfoot through heel for increased comfort and precision
  • 3-D plastic reinforcements in the heel for pressure control and wear-resistance
  • Sport sole (NNN compatible) is stable and provides a precise kick with good boot-to-ski contact
name: Rossignol X8 Classc FW Boots - Women's
